contact_data.intro: Enter the address of your shop so others know where to find you.

cookies_consent.text: We use cookies on our website. Some of them are essential, while others help us to improve this website and your experience.

local_delivery.description: We ensure that our customers receive their goods promptly
local_delivery.name: Local Delivery

parcel.description: On request we also send the packages by letter and post
parcel.name: Postal and parcel delivery

pickup.description: Customers can also pick up our goods on site
pickup.name: Pickup

description.intro: If you like, describe your business in a few sentences. Let your creativity run free!

information.error_occurred: An error occurred. Please refresh the page.
information.intro: Thanks for your registration! With just a few steps we help you to create your shop. Here we go!
information.ready_to_start: You are ready to start now.
information.shop_created_confirmation: You have successfully created a shop!
information.shop_error_confirmation: Check again that you have filled in all fields correctly.
information.shop_not_found: Your shop was not found. Create a new one.

about.text: Lokabees - the initiative for a colorful neighborhood and the digitization of local retail. The team consists of around 20 committed specialists from the areas of development, UX design, marketing and business development as well as numerous other supporters who work together on lokabees.
about.title: About Lokabees

contact.text: Stay updated for new features, new shops, local updates and more with our newsletter!
contact.title: Let's stay in contact

shop_list.no_shops: We have not found any shops in this area :-( Feel free to ask local shop owners to register their shop on lokabees.

sponsors.subtext: Would you like to offer your support? Email us:
sponsors.title: Our sponsors

landing_page.title: Find local products from retailers near you!

picture.intro: Show your shop with a photo and your logo.

processes.intro: We are currently under construction. You can now fill your shop with life by adding your first articles. This will help us to further develop our platform.

shop.no_products: Unfortunately, the shop owner did not upload any products yet.

signup.successful_registration: Your registration was successful! You can log in now.
